text.0: set this our sacrifice among the immortals be pleased with these our presents jātavedas.
text.1: o priest o agni sit thee down before us and first enjoy the drops of oil and fatness.
text.2: for thee o purifier flow the drops of fatness rich in oil.
text.3: after thy wont vouchsafe to us the choicest boon that gods may feast.
text.4: agni most excellent for thee the sage are drops that drip with oil.
text.5: thou art enkindled as the best of seers help thou the sacrifice.
text.6: to thee o agni mighty and resistless to thee stream forth the drops of oil and fatness.
text.7: with great light art thou come o praised by poets accept our offering o thou sage.
text.8: fatness exceeding rich extracted from the midstthis as our gift we offer thee.
text.9: excellent god the drops run down upon thy skin deal them to each among the gods.
